wikipedia_page.main: Martin Schröder   in an inorganic chemist. He is Vice President and Dean for the Faculty of Science and Engineering and Professor of Chemistry in the Department of Chemistry at the University of Manchester since June 2015. He served previously as Executive Dean of the Faculty of Science from 2011 to 2015 and Professor of Inorganic Chemistry at the University of Nottingham from 1995 to 2015.

response: ** Martin Schröder (born 1931), Dutch pilot and businessman
*Prof Martin Schröder – Vice President and Dean of Engineering and Physical Science, Professor of Chemistry University of Manchester

link_mentions.page: University of Manchester Faculty of Science and Engineering
response: in May 2009, and was confirmed as Dean in December the same year. He was replaced by the current dean by Chemist Martin Schröder in 2015.
